subject: Baseplate
description_text:
Hello, I ordered “
SIMSONN Plus X Racing Simulator Hydraulic Pedals Sim Racing Pedals Support Haptic Reactor (Plus X Black P3-H3-Plate)”
Everything but the baseplate showed up this week. Is there a reason the baseplate didn’t arrive with the pedals? If for some reason it isn’t available now I would like a refund and I’ll get a different set of pedals. 


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi corey jones,  Could you please provide your order number so we can check it for you? Also, may I ask why you are considering switching to another pedal brand? We’d like to understand the reason so we can better assist you or see if there’s anything we can improve on our side.

Order summary
Order placed
December 29, 2025
Order #
113-8013391-5295410

   -

I would only switch brands if you guys are unable to provide the base with
the pedals. I honestly am excited to try these but I need the full kit with
the base for my setup to be used. I’m hoping it was just a mistake and you
guys can ship the rest of the order so I can get it set up soon

Thank you

On Sun, Jan 11, 2026 at 1:05 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi corey jones,  Hi, I am sorry for it. Due to a current shortage of black base plate in our US warehouse, we have sent you the pedals first. The black base plate will arrive at the warehouse  Wednesday, and we will ship the black base plate immediately upon arrival and provide you with the tracking number.

Thank you for the update!

On Mon, Jan 12, 2026 at 2:31 AM service@simsonn.com
